input.system: You are an SRE using MCP tools. You MUST gather evidence via tool calls before answering. Output ONLY valid JSON with exact keys: {"priority":"P1|P2|P3","confidence":"High|Medium|Low","evidence_keys":[enum],"notes":string(<=200 chars)}. Types MUST be strings (e.g., priority="P2", not 2). Use only allowed evidence_keys for route-5xx: ["endpoints_empty", "route_tls_mismatch", "backend_pods_failing", "service_selector_mismatch", "no_evidence"]. If tools fail (NotFound/Forbidden/etc.), do NOT output the error objectâ€”still return the schema with best-effort labels (use "no_evidence" if necessary). Use keys like "endpoints_empty","backend_pods_failing","route_tls_mismatch". No prose or extra fields.
input.user: Investigate route 5xx in ns=shop, route=checkout. Use describe(endpoints), describe(route), and describe(pod) to collect evidence. Return only JSON (priority, confidence, evidence_keys, notes).
